oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Molecular complexity from aromatics. Cycloaddition of cyclohexa-2,4-dienones, sigmatropic 1,2-acyl shift and ring-closing metathesis: a new, efficient, and stereoselective synthesis of (Â±)-hirsutic acid C and medium ring carbocycles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, VISHWAKARMA
PAL, SHANTANU
TOSH, DILIP K
SHAIKH, MOBIN M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diels-alder reaction
hirsutic acid
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new, stereoselective formal synthesis of hirsutic acid and medium ring carbocyclic systems from salicyl alcohol is described. Cycloaddition between electron deficient partners such as cyclohexa-2,4-dienone and methylmethacrylate, triplet sensitized 1,2-acyl shift and ring-closing metathesis are the key features of our approach.
